title: Ep. 751 President Trump's Big Day
description:
Summary:
In this episode I address the big political wins for President Trump yesterday. I also address the decision from the Supreme Court about union dues and what it means to you. I also discuss the growing violence and aggression on the Left. 
 
News Picks:
Elaine Chao gives it right back to aggressive leftist protestors. 
 
This may be the best political ad I’ve ever seen.
 
Four big takeaways from last night’s huge electoral upset in a congressional race. 
 
The Democrats suffered a big loss at the Supreme Court yesterday. 
 
The media is largely fake news, and Americans are starting to realize it. 
 
This piece sums up liberals' misguided views on tax cuts. 
 
A big loss at the Supreme Court for organized labor.
 
Copyright CRTV. All rights reserved.
